label.description: Describe the array of attachments the copilot is expected to return that will contain the JSON records for the Adaptive Cards or Basic Cards. Select Apply to see an example (existing values will be overwritten).

Validate the attachment (adaptive card) in the agent's response using the selected comparison operator. Enter the expected string, select a comparison operator, and the agent's response will be compared to the string using the selected operator to determine the test case result. Select Apply to see an example (existing values will be overwritten).

Validate the attachment (e.g., an adaptive card) in the agent's response using AI. You can enter validation instructions, which will be passed to the AI. It will validate the response based on these instructions and determine the test case result. Select Apply to see an example (existing values will be overwritten).

Describe the array of attachments the copilot is expected to return that will contain the JSON records for the Adaptive Cards or Basic Cards. Select Apply to see an example (existing values will be overwritten).
